# Sample Document for Testing

This is a test document used by the MegaDoc test suite.

## Section 1: Introduction

The MegaDoc platform converts various document formats to Markdown.
It supports PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and image files.

## Section 2: Features

- Universal document conversion
- RAG pipeline with semantic chunking
- Multi-model AI chat
- Enterprise security features

## Section 3: Conclusion

This sample document demonstrates the conversion capabilities.
